sentences: Miyu Nagase (長瀬 実夕, Nagase Miyu, born May 20, 1988, in Hokkaido) is a Japanese singer, guitarist and a former member of all-female pop rock band Zone, which disbanded in 2005.
In 1998, she was selected as one of the final four members to be in the pop band Zone.
Nagase released two solo singles in December 2004: "Just 4 your Luv" (December 1, 2004) and "Snowy Love" (December 15, 2004).
On February 23, 2005, she released "Luv & Love Clips from N.Y.", which showed her recording "Just 4 Your Luv" and "Snowy Love" in New York.
Taiyo no Take Off / Kimi wa Boku no Aozora (太陽のテイクオフ/君はボクの青空) (2006.08) (with Nagisa no All Stars)
